intro.heading: The English language consists of four essential components
intro.imageAlt: An illustration representing the basics of English

episodes.title: Vocabulary
content: Words and expressions used for communication
Can be learned through reading texts and watching videos

episodes.title: Grammar
content: The rules that govern sentence structure (e.g., tenses, pronouns, conjunctions)
Learn it gradually, focusing more on practical application than theoretical memorization

episodes.title: Pronunciation
content: The correct way to pronounce words.
Learn it by imitating native speakers and practicing speaking out loud.
